document.full_text: works by monet, picasso and maurice de vlaminck each sold for more than $20 million on wednesday at a christie's auction which totaled $156 million, just shy of the low pre-sale estimate for the offering of impressionist and modern art.
document.title: christie's art auction falls short of estimate
lines_and_colors: works by monet, picasso and maurice de vlaminck each sold for more than $20 million on wednesday at a christie's auction which totaled $156 million, just shy of the low pre-sale estimate for the offering of impressionist and modern art.
